name: Techno Marketing Consultants (TMC)
overview:
Techno Marketing Consultants (TMC™) is a leading Marketing Consulting firm offers marketing consulting services to Small, Medium and Large scale organizations across the world.

A broad spectrum of service portfolio includes Marketing Consulting Service, Marketing Strategy, Branding, Internet Marketing Consulting, Internet Marketing Strategy, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Social Media Marketing (SMM), Pay-Per-Click (PPC) Advertising, Corporate Blog Management, Lead Generation, Email Marketing, New Product Launch, Competitive Analysis, Industry Analysis, Customer Analysis, Marketing Research and Market Intelligence Service.

Our Core Values

* Customer Centric Approach
* Systematic and Scientific Methodology
* Well-defined Processes
* Well –qualified team of Techno Marketing Professionals includes Technocrats, SEO Experts, Internet Marketing Consultants, Creative Writers, Designers and Developers
* Transparency and integrity
